CN.content:
Please identify the "Material Name" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: Solar cells using PffBB-n as a donor material and PC71BM as the acceptor material were fabricated with an inverted device structure of ITO / ZnO / PffBB-n:PC71BM(1 : 2 w / w ) / MoO 3 / Al.

Let's think step by step.

| Material Name |
| ------------ |
| PffBB-n       |
| PC71BM        |
| ITO          |
| ZnO          |
| MoO3         |
| Al            |

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Material name" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Material Name |
| ------------ |
| PffBB-n       |
| PC71BM        |
| ITO (Indium Tin Oxide) |
| ZnO (Zinc Oxide) |
| MoO3 (Molybdenum Trioxide) |
| Al (Aluminum) |

[Note: ITO (Indium Tin Oxide) is often considered a material property for thin film transistors and other electronic devices, but in this context, it is mentioned as a material used in the fabrication of solar cells. To maintain consistency with the rest of the entities in the paragraph, it is included in the table.]
